FormLocalizationProvider - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.hw10.jnotepadpp.localize
Class derived from LocalizationProviderBridge; in its constructor it registers itself as a WindowListener to its JFrame; when frame is opened, it calls connect and when frame is closed, it calls disconnect.
